game.name: Ancient Ore
game.description:
Are you searching for the best arcade puzzle challenge during your fun time? If yes, join Ancient Ore and allow yourself to get the best entertainment available online for free. Lots of treasure are scattered here. All you need to do is just show your matching skills to get those precious gems. Your objective in this brand new free online game is to match up all of the gems that you see on the screen. Play wisely to reach the bottom of this mine and spot some cool secrets!
Common boys and girls! We know that you are skilled enough to step inside this treasure mine. Be careful and try to be as quick as you can to mine the gems that are very precious and worth holding! Match at least 3 or more of the identical gems to achieve the objective given in each level! Get ready to play through multiple levels in this HTML5 match-3 game! Continue your game by dragging the row sideways, downwards or upwards!
Matching 3 of the same-coloured games will help you to collect some points. Get some special gems by matching 4 or 5 gems of the same colour! This will also help you to earn extra points. You can move to the advanced level only if you complete the objective of the present level. In each level, you have to grab a certain number of points. How far you will go will depend upon how wisely you play. The top right corner of the screen will show your score and level. Good luck to complete each level before running out of moves available at your hand!

game.mobileControlKeys: DRAG THE ENTIRE ROW TO MATCH THE GEMS BY SWIPE ON THE SCREEN
game.webControlKeys: DRAG THE ENTIRE ROW TO MATCH THE GEMS BY L CLICK OF MOUSE
